title: The Moon Thieves
overview: Loi Bo Watch Company, Hong Kong's esteemed watch boutique, conceals a thrilling secretâ€”it serves as the epicentre for stolen timepieces. Under the icy command of Uncle, a fearless crew assembles: an audacious thief, explosive specialist, lock-picking prodigy, and watch connoisseur. Their target? Tokyo, where they plan to heist three ultra-luxury watches.
